God is angry about divorce if it happens without a serious reason. The phrase "saving for the cause of fornication" means "except for reasons of cheating or sexual activity outside of marriage." It means the only valid reason for divorce is if the partner has been unfaithful. God allows divorce if the marriage is life-threatening, involves adultery, or abandonment, as stated in Matthew 5:32 and 1 Corinthians 7:15.

In our country, annulment has not been effective. It hasn't helped the increasing number of Filipinos living together without being married because their first marriages are not yet legally annulled. Many Filipinos cannot afford the cost of annulment. If some people think divorce is immoral, what about those who are living together while still legally married to their first spouse? We cannot stop a person from leaving their marriage when they feel their life is in danger, and we cannot stop a person from falling in love again after a failed marriage. It is human nature. Allowing divorce would provide a clear, legal way for these individuals to end their first marriage and remarry, giving them the chance to live in stable and legally recognized unions.

Kung nabasa niyo na ang Absolute Divorce Bill (ADB) mapapansin ninyo na uulitin lang nito ang mga provisions on the grounds of Absolute Divorce na nasa mga kasalukuyang batas.

Nakalagay sa ADB na ang mga grounds for absulute divorce ay ang nga nakatala sa Family Code of the Philippines (FCP) specifically on Art 45-55, o ang mga probisyon na tumatalakay sa Annulment at Legal Separation. Ang mga nakalagay sa provisions na ito na nasa FCP ay uulitin lang din sa ADB. Gayundin ang mga probisyon sa VAWC at batas laban sa Bigamy na nakalagay din sa ADB.

May ilang modifications and addendum nga lang, gaya ng limang taon nang hindi nagsasama at hindi na maaaring maayos pa ang pagsasama gayundin ang gender reassignment, at iba pa.

Kung susumahin, hindi kailangan ng diborsyo. Ang kailangan ay palakasin ang kasalukuyang nga batas ng Pilipinas at pag-ibayuhin ito upang mas mapalawak at mas mapalakas ang sinasaklawan nito.

Nakakalungkot lang na tinatawag kaming Anti-Poor, Anti-Women, at iba pang pagkantyaw. Kung anti-poor at anti-women kami, disinsanay hindi kami lumalaban para amyendahan ang VAWC at Family Code ng Pilipinas upang mas mapaigting at mapalawak ito.
